version_description: Category updated
Category updated

■ More personal with avoiding recent!
You do not want to care about the others even more! Let's try avoiding option.
■ Save Twitter Media section!
It became to be able to choose the presence / absence of images with simultaneous tweets. Even without images, images are displayed in Twitter official client, so You do not want to fill the media section!
■ Improved stability
Refresh display program. It became more stable.

The function to post multiple files will be provided in the next edition.

■ More personal with avoiding recent!
You do not want to care about the others even more! Let's try avoiding option.
■ Save Twitter Media section!
It became to be able to choose the presence / absence of images with simultaneous tweets. Even without images, images are displayed in Twitter official client, so You do not want to fill the media section!
■ Improved stability
Refresh display program. It became more stable.

The function to post multiple files will be provided in the next edition.
■ Supported multi-file posting
■ Supported multi-file posting

- You can re-edit submitted works.
- The order of images that have been posted together has been changed.
- Twitter follower limited release function is now available.
- Apps now run faster.
- Minor bug fixes.
